A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Positives:
Great space battles.
Amazing light saber choreography\, with beautiful cinematography during these scenes.
Relationship between Rey and Kylo Ren\, and how they were both conflicted about being good/bad. Luke's fear about Rey turning to the dark side.
A lot of good acting.
Some interesting political statements.

Negatives:
Luke's actions/dialogue. First scene of him throwing the lightsaber says it all.
Too much comedy\, many jokes did not land and overall undermined serious scenes.
No Knights of Ren. Snoke + Phasma end up being meaningless characters.
Undermined a lot of the first movie. Luke didn't train Rey\, Snoke didn't train Kylo.
The whole Casino scene + Finn and Rose Subplot (Awful).
First Order are useless.
Leia Flying...
CGI Yoda from far away but Puppet up close! Why not just use a Puppet for the whole thing\, ruined the moment a bit.

Overall feel the movie didn't give the hardcore Star Wars fans\, the previous film and some of the original Characters the respect they deserved.
